answer:
As per the current BCCDC immunization guidelines, three doses of the Twinrix vaccine are recommended.  Booster doses are not currently recommended for people who have received all three doses as per the standard schedule. 
- Immunization Nurse
question: My doctor told me I probably didn't need the 3rd dose of Twinrix (1 & 2 in 2010) because he read a new directive that stated there was no proof of it's effectiveness. True? Thanks
question_variation_1: how many doses for twinrix in 2010
question_variation_2: why does twinrix need three doses
